greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of compositions of n into parts with distinct multiplicities and with exactly k parts; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i, s) option remember; `if`(n=0, add(j, j=s)!,
`if`(i<1, 0, expand(add(`if`(j>0 and j in s, 0, x^j*
mathematica: b[n_, i_, s_] := b[n, i, s] = If[n==0, Total[s]!, If[i<1, 0, Expand[Sum[ If[j>0 && MemberQ[s, j], 0, x^j*b[n-i*j, i-1, If[j==0, s, s ~Union~ {j}] ]/j!], {j, 0, n/i}]]]]; T[n_] := Function[p, Table[Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, 0, Exponent[p, x]}]][b[n, n, {}]]; Table[T[n], {n, 0, 16}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 08 2017, translated from Maple *)
program: T(n)={Vecrev(((r,k,b,w)->if(!k||!r, if(r,0,w!*x^w), sum(m=0, r\k, if(!m || !bittest(b,m), self()(r-k*m, k-1, bitor(b,1<<m), w+m)/m!))))(n,n,1,0))}
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 25 2014
